text: @Jim_Jordan What about these stats for your state of Ohio? Confirmed coronavirus cases: 30, 794   Deaths: 1,872  Are these figures fake?  Do these people not matter?  This is not a wrestling match.  This is real life, and you are calling it fake. What is up w/you?
